data.title: 41 indoor play areas for kids around Charlotte, including swimming, skating, climbing, more...
data.meta_description: Find an indoor playground near you in Charlotte to keep the kids busy when they can't play outside.
data.text:
When the weather keeps you indoors but your kids need to burn off some energy, this list of indoor playgrounds and play areas of different kinds around Charlotte will come in handy. We’ve included trampoline parks, arcades, children’s museums, skating rinks, bowling alleys, climbing gyms, go karting, laser tag facilities and more.

Before you make plans, always check Groupon for discounts on kids’ activities!

We’ve included activities for toddlers through teenagers. Know of something that should be in the list? Just email info@charlotteonthecheap.com

You might also be interested in:

Signing up for Charlotte on the Cheap’s daily email

Outdoor movies

100 screen-free activities for kids at home

Upcoming free and cheap events for kids

Free things for kids to do in Charlotte

Free and cheap things to do this week

Free museum days in the Charlotte area

Indoor Playgrounds in Charlotte

Altitude Trampoline Park

3940 E Franklin Blvd, Gastonia

Adventure Landing – Gastonia

2600 East Franklin Boulevard

A family entertainment park featuring go-karts, mini-golf courses, batting cages, and indoor arcade, and more. Most of the activities are outside, but inside you’ll find the arcade.

AMF University Lanes

5900 North Tryon Street, Charlotte

Features 40 bowling lanes and pool tables. Plus a pro shop and sports bar, for the adults.

Groupon available

Barefoot Archery

4410 Old Pineville Rd, Charlotte

Barefoot Archery is an archery shop that has a 20 yard, eight lane USA Archery approved range that is well lighted, clean and safe. Calling for reservations is suggested.

Big Air Trampoline Park

2408 Sardis Rd N. Charlotte

Trampoline park, laser maze, basketball, dodgeball, climbing wall, warped wall and more.

Bowlero South Boulevard

4501 South Boulevard, Charlotte

Features bowling lanes, an arcade, and pool tables. Plus a pro shop and sports bar for the adults.

Groupon available

Bowlero Matthews

11210 Brigman Road, Matthews

Features 56 bowling lanes and an arcade. Plus a pro shop and sports bar.

Groupon available

BounceU – Matthews

9129 Monroe Road, Suite 145 & 150, Charlotte

Open Bounce sessions available at scheduled times for varying prices.

Carolina Place Mall Children’s Play Area

11025 Carolina Place Parkway, Pineville

Free

A children’s play area designed for children 48” tall and under that features crawl spaces, tunnels, and more.

Chick-fil-A

Locations throughout Charlotte area

Most locations offer an indoor playground area for children 48” and under. Call your local Chick-fil-a for more information.

Chuck E. Cheese’s

Several locations

Features play zones, arcade games, concessions, and more. Check the website for local coupons.

Cliff Hangers

326 Oates Road, Mooresville

State-of-the-art indoor climbing facility.

Defy

8116 University City Blvd., Charlotte

Open jump, dodgeball, foam pit, Ninja course, trapeze, more

Discovery Place Kids

105 Gilead Road, Huntersville

Children’s museum featuring developmentally-appropriate experiences that encourage interactive learning through play.

Discovery Place Nature

1658 Sterling Road, Charlotte

Features interactive nature exhibits and live animal displays as well as daily programming and hands-on activities.

Discovery Place Science

301 North Tryon Street, Charlotte

An interactive science and technology museum for visitors of all ages.

Eastway Regional Recreation Center

3150 Eastway Park Drive, Charlotte

Fun pool with lazy river and slides. Indoor basketball court.

Extreme Ice Center

4705 Indian Trail-Fairview Road, Indian Trail

Public ice skating is offered year round. Please check the schedule online for updated times.

Frankie’s

10621 Bryton Corporate Center Drive, Huntersville

Indoor and outdoor amusement park, with bowling, mini golf, a fun house, virtual reality, go karts, arcade games, indoor and outdoor rides, and more.

George Pappas’ Liberty Lanes

2501 S. York Road, Gastonia

ImaginOn: The Joe & Joan Martin Center

300 East Seventh Street, Charlotte

Free

An interactive library that features two state of the art theaters, a dedicated library space for kids 11 and under, four multi-use classrooms, a teen-only library, a multimedia production studio, and more. Classes and events are offered throughout the week.

Inner Peaks Climbing Center

Matthews: 10715 Independence Pointe Parkway, Matthews

South End: 2220 S Tryon St, Charlotte

Indoor climbing gym.

Jumpin Jax Fun Center

2650 Charlotte Hwy, Lancaster, SC 29720

Three stories of tunnels, tubes, slides, ball pits, ball blasters, sensory panels and more

Just Play

9535 South Boulevard, Charlotte

Adventure playground with climbing structures, a ninja course, interactive digital games and more.

Kate’s Skating Rink – Indian Trail

14500 Independence Blvd, Indian Trail

Kate’s Skating Rink – Gastonia

1151 Skating Rink Drive, Gastonia

Monster Mini Golf

230 East W.T. Harris Blvd. C-4, Charlotte

Spooky themed indoor mini golf complex.

Northern Regional Recreation Center

18121 Old Statesville Road, Cornelius

Pool with waterslide. Indoor basketball court.

Pineville Ice House

400 Towne Centre Boulevard, Pineville

Ice skating

The Pit Indoor Kart Racing

346 East Plaza Drive (Hwy 150), Mooresville

High-speed Go-Karts, over 65 Arcade Games, 4 Billiard Tables, Laser Tag Arena, Black Light Mini-Golf, Cannonball Air Blaster, Spin Zone bumper cars, and a 24-foot Rock Climbing Wall. Free Wi-Fi and a viewing area overlooking the kart track with 6 wide-screen TVs.

Ray’s Playhouse at Berewick Recreation Center

5910 Dixie River Road, Charlotte

Free

Open to both children and families and features toys, games, activities, and kid friendly computers. For ages 1 – 6.

Ray’s Splash Planet

215 North Sycamore Street, Charlotte

A one-of-a-kind indoor waterpark featuring a giant slide, lazy river, vortex pool, and water playground.

NOTE: the pool/waterpark is currently closed for maintenance. The gymnasium remains open.

Sky Zone Trampoline Park

10200 Centrum Parkway, Pineville

7325 Smith Corners Blvd, Charlotte

Trampoline Park featuring dodgeball areas, basketball areas, a foam zone, and more.

Spare Time

16317 Statesville Rd. Huntersville

9600 Pineville-Matthews Road, Pineville

Bowling, virtual reality coaster, laser tag, arcade

Sports Connection – Ballantyne

11611 Ardrey Kell Road, Charlotte.

Center featuring arcade games, bowling, laser tap, jump-n-play area, and more.

Sports Connection – Northlake

8626 Hankins Road, Charlotte

Center featuring arcade games, bowling, laser tap, jump-n-play area, and more.

Urban Air Mint Hill

9108 Lawyers Rd, Mint Hill

Trampoline park, including ropes course, obstacle course, dodgeball and more.

Urban Air Cornelius

17001 Kenton Drive, Cornelius

Trampoline park, including ropes course, obstacle course, dodgeball and more.

Victory Lane Karting

2330 Tipton Dr. Ste. 100, Charlotte

Go karts, bowling, axe throwing, virtual reality, arcade. Check calendar for public walk-in times.
